a1: An SVG wave is a scalable vector graphic that creates a wavy pattern, commonly used as a decorative background or section divider on websites.
a2: Yes, you can set two colors for the gradient background and adjust the number of overlapping wave layers.
q3: How do I use the wave on my website?
a3: Download the SVG file and use it as a background image, or copy the SVG code and paste it directly into your HTML.
a4: Yes, SVG graphics are resolution-independent and scale perfectly on all screen sizes and devices.
